# Turtleand

> Where Humans and Technology Evolve Together. Personal ecosystem exploring AI, growth engineering, software craft, and blockchain.

## Main Sites
- [Growth Blog](https://growth.turtleand.com/llms.txt): Essays on AI, technology, human potential, and personal growth
- [AI Lab](https://lab.turtleand.com/llms.txt): 6-module hands-on curriculum for building practical LLM tools and agents
- [Build](https://build.turtleand.com/llms.txt): Engineering fundamentals, software craft, and deep technical understanding
- [OpenClaw Lab](https://openclaw.turtleand.com/llms.txt): Setup guides for the OpenClaw AI assistant platform

## About
- [About Turtleand](https://turtleand.com/about): Software engineer with 10+ years building production systems, focused on AI integration and human-centered technology
